content.title: Letter of Intent to Purchase Real Property

sections.heading: Property Information
sections.content: Property Address: {{property_address}}, {{property_city}}, {{property_state}} {{property_zip}}

sections.heading: Parties
sections.content:
Buyer: {{company_name}}
Seller: {{contact_name}}

sections.heading: Purchase Price
sections.content: The Buyer offers to purchase the above-referenced property for ${{offer_price}} ({{offer_price_text}}).

sections.heading: Earnest Money
sections.content: Upon acceptance of this Letter of Intent, Buyer will deposit ${{earnest_money}} as earnest money with {{title_company}}.

sections.heading: Due Diligence Period
sections.content: Buyer shall have {{due_diligence_days}} days from the execution of the Purchase Agreement to conduct all necessary inspections.

sections.heading: Closing Date
sections.content: The closing shall occur on or before {{closing_date}}, unless extended by mutual agreement.

sections.heading: Property Condition
sections.content: The property will be purchased in its current "as-is" condition.

sections.heading: Non-Binding Agreement
sections.content: This Letter of Intent does not create a binding contractual obligation. The parties intend to execute a formal Purchase Agreement containing these terms and other customary provisions.

sections.heading: Expiration
sections.content: This Letter of Intent will expire if not accepted by {{expiration_date}}.

sections.heading: Property Description
sections.content: The real property located at {{property_address}}, {{property_city}}, {{property_state}} {{property_zip}}, including all improvements and fixtures.

sections.heading: Parties
sections.content:
Buyer: {{company_name}}, a real estate investment company.
Seller: {{contact_name}}, the current owner of the Property.

sections.heading: Purchase Price and Terms
sections.content:
Purchase Price: ${{offer_price}} ({{offer_price_text}})
Payment Terms: Cash at closing

sections.heading: Earnest Money Deposit
sections.content: Upon execution of this Agreement, Buyer shall deposit ${{earnest_money}} with {{title_company}} as Earnest Money.

sections.heading: Due Diligence Period
sections.content: Buyer shall have {{due_diligence_days}} calendar days from the Effective Date to conduct inspections, review title, and perform all necessary due diligence.

sections.heading: Closing Date
sections.content: The closing shall occur on or before {{closing_date}}, or such other date as mutually agreed by the parties.

sections.heading: Title
sections.content: Seller shall convey good and marketable title to the Property to Buyer by general warranty deed, subject only to permitted exceptions.

sections.heading: Closing Costs
sections.content:
Buyer shall pay: title insurance premium, recording fees, and Buyer's attorney fees.
Seller shall pay: transfer tax, deed preparation, and Seller's attorney fees.

sections.heading: Property Condition
sections.content: The Property is being sold in "AS-IS" condition. Seller makes no warranties or representations regarding the Property condition.

sections.heading: Default
sections.content:
If Buyer defaults, Seller may retain the Earnest Money as liquidated damages.
If Seller defaults, Buyer may seek specific performance or terminate and receive a refund of the Earnest Money.

sections.heading: Cash Offer
sections.content: {{company_name}} is pleased to present this cash offer to purchase the property at {{property_address}}, {{property_city}}, {{property_state}} {{property_zip}}.

sections.heading: Offer Details
Benefits to Seller
sections.content:
• No financing contingency
• No appraisal requirement
• Flexible closing timeline
• No repairs or updates required
• No commissions or fees to pay
• Simplified transaction process

sections.heading: Next Steps
sections.content:
To accept this offer or discuss terms:
1. Reply to this email
2. Call {{sender_name}} at {{sender_phone}}
3. We will prepare all necessary paperwork

sections.heading: Offer Validity
sections.content: This cash offer is valid until {{expiration_date}}.
